Articles.Content:
It would be nice if we could see the wet and dry center of mass especially in the spaceplane hangar.

Right now I have to go to each fuel tank and empty it and refill.
I agree, though I've said it before, all of RCS Build Aid should be stock (and I rarely ever say that mods should be stock).
LOL, I saw this after posting a thread asking for COM/COL/COT indicators when ingame. This would do just as well. So these things are in a mod called RCS build aid?

2 hours ago, Majorjim said:

LOL, I saw this after posting a thread asking for COM/COL/COT indicators when ingame. This would do just as well. So these things are in a mod called RCS build aid?

Wet/dry CoM indicators, indication of torque when using various RCS attitude/translate commands, and resizable CoM/CoL/CoT indicators (the last is a brilliant feature that flies under the radar).

I have to agree with @Alshain, it's an essential mod for construction.
